itemDescription: Welsh television presenter and marathon runner

wikipedia_page.main: Lowri Morgan is a Welsh television presenter, adventurer and ultra marathon runner. She has presented S4C's coverage of the World Rally Championship, BBC’s Rugby flagship show Scrum V and the magazine show Uned 5. Morgan is one of a handful of athlete to have completed the notoriously difficult 350-mile 6633 Ultra in the Arctic and the Amazon Ultra Marathon which were both filmed for documentaries. She has also visited the site of RMS Titanic for a television documentary.
